summary: After an accidental explosion at a local mine, dinosaurs emerge from the rubble to terrorize a small western town. Now, a group of gunslingers must defend their home if anyone is going to survive in a battle of cowboys versus dinosaurs.
cast: Eric Roberts|Rib Hillis|Casey Fitzgerald|Vernon Wells|John Freeman|Sara Malakul Lane|Heather Foote|Nick Andrews|Jesse Banthem|Stephanie Michelle Bonner|Ritchie Boyd|Janet Cronsell|Jamie Greany|Jessica Greany|Winston Housel|Joe Josephson|Madison Kent|JB Klyap|Adam Knoff|Andrew Martin|Dillon Maslach|Scott McGann|Mike Mohan|Mark Murphy|Levi Rockhill|Kelcey Watson|Katie Jepson|Taylor Johnson
title: Cowboys vs Dinosaurs
